title: [Large-scale] Critical Play Literacy Design Workshop for Strengthening Secondary Mathematics Teacher Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics pedagogy and secondary curriculum comprehension
context.additional_context: Real-time interaction and formative assessment-centered feedback structures using digital devices.

learning_goals: Teacher trainees can complete the design of three or more play-based activities applicable to math lessons.
Learners can present strategies for integrating a play literacy framework that fosters critical thinking into lessons.
Participants can improve their play-centered lesson designs at least twice through peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
